channel.title: Trees only go away for me?!

item.title: Trees only go away for me?!
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

I added my own version of woodcutting(from scratch), and I finally got the stump to appear:

case 1278: if(playerHasItem(1351) || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1351) { startAnimation(879); addItem(1511, 1); addSkillXP(1000, 8); sendMessage("You get some logs."); treetimer ++; } else { treetimer --; sendMessage("You need an axe to cut this tree!"); } if (treetimer == 1) { ReplaceObject2(objectX, objectY, 1342, 0, 10); treetimer = 0; } break;
But, for some reason, the stump only appears for me, not everyone else. How do I make that appear for everyone?

Read full topic
item.source: Trees only go away for me?!
